MIA (Modular Image Analysis)

Modular, object-based analysis for ImageJ/Fiji

View on GitHub
Introduction Getting started Modules List of modules Macros Extending MIA
Back to module list

Extract substack

Description

Parameters

  • Input image
    • Type: InputImageP
  • Output image
    • Type: OutputImageP
  • Selection mode
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Fixed
    • Choices:
      • Fixed
      • Manual
  • Channels
    • Type: StringP
    • Default value: 1-end
  • Slices
    • Type: StringP
    • Default value: 1-end
  • Frames
    • Type: StringP
    • Default value: 1-end
  • Enable channels selection
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Enable slices selection
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Enable frames selection
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
ModularImageAnalysis is maintained by SJCross. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
